Verses: 1 eriko Isravel Puththirarukku Munbaaga Adaikkappattirundhadhu; Oruvarum Veliye Pogavumillai, Oruvarum Ulle Varavumillai.
2 karththar Yosuvaavai Nokki: Idho, Erigovaiyum Adhin Raajaavaiyum Yuththaveeraraiyum Un Kaiyil Oppukkoduththen.
3 yuththapurusharaagiya Neengal Anaivarum Pattanaththai Soozhndhu Orudharam Sutrivaarungal; Ippadi Aarunaal Seyyakkadaveergal.
4 ezhu Aasaariyar Pettikku Munbaaga Ezhu Kombu Ekkaalangalai Pidiththukkondupogavendum; Ezhaam Naalil Pattanaththai Ezhudharam Sutrivarakkadavargal; Aasaariyar Ekkaalangalai Oodhavendum.

5 avargal Andha Kombugalinaal Nedundhoni Idumbodhum, Neengal Ekkaala Saththaththai Ketkumbodhum, Janangal Ellaarum Magaa Aaravaaraththode Aarpparikkakkadavargal; Appozhudhu Pattanaththin Alangam Idindhuvizhum; Udane Janangal Avaravar Thangalukku Neraaga Erakkadavargal Endraar.

6 andhappadiye Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Aasaariyarai Azhaiththu: Udanbadikkai Pettiyai Eduththukkondupongal; Dhonikkum Ezhu Ekkaalangalaiyum Ezhu Aasaariyargal Karththarudaiya Pettikku Munbaaga Pidiththukkondu Pogakkadavargal Endru Solli;
7 janangalai Nokki: Pattanaththai Sutri Nadandhupongal; Yuththasannaththaraanavargalkarththarin Pettikkumun Nadakkakkadavargal Endraan.

8 yosuvaa Janangalidaththil Pesinavudane, Dhonikkum Ezhu Ekkaalangalai Pidiththirukkira Ezhu Aasaariyar Karththarukku Munbaaga Nadandhu Ekkaalangalai Oodhinaargal;karththarudaiya Udanbadikkaippetti Avargalukku Pinsendradhu.
9 ekkaalangalai Oodhugira Aasaariyarukkumun Yuththasannaththaraanavargal Nadandhaargal; Pindhandu Ekkaalangal Oodhappadumbodhu Pettikku Pinsendradhu.

10 yosuvaa Janangalai Nokki: Naan Sollum Naalmattum, Neengal Aarppariyaamalum Ungal Vaayinaal Saththangaattaamalum Irungal; Ungal Vaayilirundhu Oru Pechchum Purappadavendaam; Aarppariyungal Endru Ungalukku Naan Sollum Naalile Aarpparippeergalaaga Endru Kattalaiyittirundhaan.
11 appadiye Karththarin Pettiyai Pattanaththai Soozhndhu Orudharam Sutrivarappanninaan; Avargal Thirumba Paalayaththil Vandhu, Paalayaththil Raa Thanginaargal.
12 yosuvaa Adhigaalame Ezhundhirundhaan; Aasaariyargal Karththarin Pettiyai Sumandhukondu Ponaargal.

13 dhonikkum Ezhu Ekkaalangalai Pidikkira Ezhu Aasaariyargalum Ekkaalangalai Oodhikkonde Karththarin Pettikku Munbaaga Nadandhaargal; Yuththasannaththaraanavargal Avargalukku Munnaale Nadandhaargal; Pindhantovenil Ekkaalangal Oodhappadugaiyil, Karththarin Pettikku Pinsendradhu.
14 irandaam Naalilum Pattanaththai Orudharam Sutrivandhu, Paalayaththukku Thirumbinaargal; Indhappadi Aarunaalum Seydhaargal.
15 ezhaamnaalil, Adhigaalame Kizhakku Velukkumbodhu Ezhundhirundhu Andhappiragaarame Pattanaththai Ezhudharam Sutrivandhaargal.
16 ezhaandharam Aasaariyar Ekkaalangalai Oodhugaiyil, Yosuvaa Janangalai Nokki: Aarppariyungal, Pattanaththai Karththar Ungalukku Oppukkoduththaar.

17 aanaalum Indha Pattanamum Idhilulla Yaavum Karththarukku Saapaththeedaayirukkum; Naam Anuppina Aatkalai Raakaab Ennum Vesi Maraiththuvaiththapadiyaal, Avalum Avalode Veettukkul Irukkira Anaivarumaaththiram Uyirodirukkakkadavargal.

18 saapaththeetaanadhil Edhaakilum Etuththukkollukiradhinaale Neengal Saapaththeetaakaadhapatikkum, Isravel Paalayaththaich Chaapaththeetaakki Adhaik Kalangappannaadhapatikkum, Neengal Saapaththeetaanadharkumaaththiram Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.
19 sagala Velliyum Ponnum, Vengalaththinaalum Irumbinaalum Seyyappatta Paaththirangalum, Karththarukku Parisuththamaanavaigal; Avaigal Karththarinpokkishaththil Serum Endraan.

20 ekkaalangalai Oodhugaiyil, Janangal Aarppariththaargal; Ekkaala Saththaththai Janangal Kettu, Magaa Aaravaaraththode Muzhangugaiyil, Alangam Idindhu Vizhundhadhu; Udane Janangal Avaravar Thangalukku Neraaga Pattanaththil Eri, Pattanaththaippidiththu,
21 pattanaththilirundha Purusharaiyum Sthireegalaiyum Vaalibaraiyum Kizhavaraiyum Aadumaadugalaiyum Kazhudhaigalaiyum Sagalaththaiyum Pattayakkarukkinaal Sangaarampanninaargal.

22 yosuvaa, Dhesaththai Vevupaarththa Irandu Purusharai Nokki: Neengal Andha Vesiyin Veettile Poi, Neengal Avalukku Aanaiyittapadi Andha Sthireeyaiyum Avalukku Undaana Yaavaiyum Angeyirundhu Veliye Konduvaarungal Endraan.

23 appozhudhu Vevukaararaana Andha Vaalibar Ullepoi, Raakaapaiyum Aval Thagappanaiyum Aval Thaayaiyum Sagodharargalaiyum Avalukkulla Yaavaiyum Aval Kudumbaththaar Anaivaraiyum Veliye Azhaiththukkondu Vandhu, Avargalai Isravel Paalayaththukku Purambe Irukkumbadi Panninaargal

24 pattanaththaiyum Adhilulla Yaavaiyum Akkiniyaal Sutteriththaargal; Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum, Vengalaththinaalum Irumbinaalum Seydhapaaththirangalaiyumaaththiram Karththarin Aalayappokkishaththil Serththaargal.

25 erigovai Vevupaarkka Yosuvaa Anuppina Aatkalai Raakaap Ennum Vesi Maraiththuvaiththapadiyinaal, Avalaiyum Aval Thagappan Veettaaraiyum Avalukkulla Yaavaiyum Yosuvaa Uyirode Vaiththaan; Aval Innaalvaraikkum Isravelin Naduvile Kudiyirukkiraal.

26 akkaalaththile Yosuvaa: Indha Erigo Pattanaththai Kattumbadi Ezhumbum Manushankarththarukku Munbaaga Sabikkappattirukkakkadavan; Avan Adhin Asthibaaraththai Podugirapodhu Than Mooththa Kumaaranaiyum, Adhin Vaasalgalai Vaikkirapodhu Than Ilaiya Kumaaranaiyum Saaga Kodukkakkadavan Endru Saabam Koorinaan.
27 ivvidhamaai Karththar Yosuvaavodekooda Irundhaar; Avan Keerththi Dhesamengum Parampitru.
